title: Apple’s plan to win gaming wars
text:
Apple TV set to declare war on console gaming market Rod Chester National technology writer News Corp Australia Network Apple TV set to declare war on console gaming market Rod Chester National technology writer News Corp Australia Network Play on ... the Apple TV is about to get a major upgrade and could emerge as the next game console everyone wants to play with. APPLE does not just want to transform the way you watch TV. It could also be planning to transform the games you play in your living room. 
In the lead-up to the massive Apple event in San Francisco next week, details have emerged on how the Apple TV poses a threat to the big console game market dominated by Sony PlayStation and Microsoft Xbox. 
Mark Gurman , of 9to5Mac , has published details of the new remote for the Apple TV set top box expected to be announced next week which highlights Apple’s big push into the gaming console market. Other Stories
